data.title: What is Homeopathy?​
data.meta_description: What is Homeopathy?​ Homeopathy is a gentle and natural healing system that works with the body to relieve symptoms, restore vitality, and improve overall health A federally recognized form of medicine regulated by the FDA, Homeopathy can help strengthen the body to fight short-term illness such as colds, flus, earache, sore throats, and more. For […]
data.text:
A federally recognized form of medicine regulated by the FDA, Homeopathy can help strengthen the body to fight short-term illness such as colds, flus, earache, sore throats, and more. For chronic conditions like asthma, depression, autism, or arthritis, find a professional homeopathic practitioner.

Homeopathic remedies are environmentally friendly, cruelty free, and derived from natural sources. Affordable, over-the-counter remedies are available at natural food stores, homeopathic pharmacies, online retailers, and even some traditional grocery stores and pharmacies.
